underlying_goal: To correct data inconsistencies (prompt counts, filtering results) in a weekly presentation slide deck by verifying against source files.
primary_success: Accurately finding the source-of-truth YAML files and experiment reports, cross-referencing them against the slide deck, and clearly explaining the discrepancies before fixing them.
brief_summary: The user asked Claude to fix inconsistent numbers in their slides. Claude found the source-of-truth YAML file to confirm the correct prompt count. The user then asked to verify prompt filtering numbers; Claude found experiment reports, identified a major discrepancy, and updated the slides with the correct, lower numbers based on the specified filtering thresholds.
